moves.1. e4: Well, this is a great game from my friend melhow. He won this game in a team match, and caused us to move up from rank 45 to 22. Thanks man!! Hope you all enjoy it!
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. Bc4: The great way to start off a game. However, maybe better would be d4, ripping up the center in the beginning of the game.
moves.3... Bg4 4. Nc3 a6: Not the best, better would probably be nf6 or nc6.
moves.5. Nxe5: Wow!! A great move, winning a pawn.
moves.5... Bxd1: A horrible blunder, you will see how melhow here destroyed him.
moves.6. Bxf7+ Ke7 7. Nd5#: Wow, amazing!! What a great game melhow, and thanks for the win and the team match. Hope you liked it, and please rate it.
